summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Luxury Eyeshadow Palette is a four-step eyeshadow quad with buildable, non-creasing formula and pigmented shades for day to night.
details: DetailsFeaturesEach palette contains four harmonious eye colors: Prime, Enhance, Smoke, and Pop.Create a smooth base for your eye look using the Prime shade.Build up definition with Enhance.Add drama with the Smoke shade.Finish your dazzling look with the shimmer Pop shade.The collection ranges from bronze and golden to deep reds and purples, and can be built for a day, desk, dusk, or disco look.The step by step application is artistry made easy.Item 2619330How To UseTo use, start by applying the Prime shade of the eyeshadow palette all over your eyelid with the Eye Blender Brush. Pop In the inner corner of your eyes to open up and widen.Blend the Enhance shade across the crease of your eyelid, Then apply along your upper and lower lash line for a gorgeous wearable daytime makeup look. Finish off the look with Full Fat Lashes Mascara suitable for work or a day date.To amp up for evening, repeat steps one and two. apply the Smoke shade upwards and outwards into your socket. apply along the upper and lower lash line for a more intense gaze.For a nighttime makeup look, apply the Pop shade to the center of your eyelid using your ring finger for added glamour. Use Legendary Lashes Mascara for a finishing touch to your evening eye look.IngredientsPrime, Enhance: Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Smoke: Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Pop: Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Hydroxystearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To use, start by applying the Prime shade of the eyeshadow palette all over your eyelid with the Eye Blender Brush. Pop In the inner corner of your eyes to open up and widen.Blend the Enhance shade across the crease of your eyelid, Then apply along your upper and lower lash line for a gorgeous wearable daytime makeup look. Finish off the look with Full Fat Lashes Mascara suitable for work or a day date.To amp up for evening, repeat steps one and two. apply the Smoke shade upwards and outwards into your socket. apply along the upper and lower lash line for a more intense gaze.For a nighttime makeup look, apply the Pop shade to the center of your eyelid using your ring finger for added glamour. Use Legendary Lashes Mascara for a finishing touch to your evening eye look.

reviews.headline: Not good for sensitive eyes
reviews.comments: Beautiful, vibrant, highly pigmented color but it dried my skin out so bad that it felt sunburned.

reviews.headline: Cute but too expensive
reviews.comments: Way too expensive for just 4 eyeshadows. You can find the same quality, same amount of pigment in other brands that don't cost as much.

reviews.headline: My Everyday Signature
reviews.comments: I bought The Sophisticate having never tried any CT products.  This is now my go to for every day.  One compact for shadow, soft eyeliner, and the can even use the dark brown for my brows. Add mascara, tightliner, and a little brow gel (if needed) for a finished, polished everyday!

reviews.headline: Loving it!
reviews.comments: Loving the Charlotte Tilbury golden goddess palette. It's highly pigmented and goes on really well. This and my Anastasia palette are my go-tos.

reviews.headline: Beautiful Palette
reviews.comments: Love this palette and really impressed with how long it stayed on. Longest lasting of any eyeshadows I use. Can't wait to buy another one!

reviews.headline: Colors Misleading Online
reviews.comments: I purchased the Pillow Talk quad because I liked the pink-hued colors as they appeared online. Upon receiving it, however, only one of the four shades is actually pink. The remaining shades are bronze /orange, which aren't my cup of tea. It's frustrating that there is such a discrepancy between the way things appear online and what they actually look like.

reviews.headline: Stunning Eyeshadow Palette
reviews.comments: This Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Dreams eyeshadow palette is beyond what I expected. Colors and payoff are perfect. Great quality, as well. I have several Pat McGrath palettes and am shocked that I like this smaller quad palette just as much.

reviews.headline: Definitely a rebuy
reviews.comments: It's a very luxurious eyeshadow. It blends well and the quality is great. I would definitely buy more.

reviews.headline: Found my HG palette
reviews.comments: I bought the color Sophisticate and OMG it's wonderful. I'm not a very big eyeshadow person so I just require something basic as far as colors go; I've bought multiple eyeshadow palettes, tried different brands, this is by far the best as far as quality, color, and manageability goes. I love it, will purchase over and over again, and it's worth every single penny.

reviews.headline: This eyeshadow palette is no shame to your eyes!
reviews.comments: This eyeshadow palette is beautiful and highly pigmented. I have fair skin and I apply the Walk Of No Shame Prime, Enhance and Pop eyeshadow colors on my eyelids, and I use the darkest crimson shade only to the outer corner of my eyes and very light on the upper and lower lashline. I highly recommend and love the eyeliner, lipstick and blush to complement your eye look!

reviews.headline: JUST DONT, FOR THE PRICE, NOPE
reviews.comments: I dont understand where all the rave reviews are coming from. I bought literally, the whole line, make up and skin care. It's a lie. For the price of these items, you expect so much more. My skin, not plump, if anything drier. Look at the ingredients. Its harsh.

reviews.headline: Dreamy shadows!!
reviews.comments: This little pallet is dreamy! So creamy and easy to blend. Really good color payoff. The glitters are very much so GLITTER so they don't have a dense pigment behind them, they are beautiful to layer with the matte shades. Will be purchasing more of these little palettes!

reviews.headline: Too expensive for very little pigment
reviews.comments: I really liked the color story (neutral to warm) but for the price, i expect a lot more pigment. Pillow Talk barely showed up on my very fair skin. The pale pink and brown looked too similar to each other once applied. I wouldn't repurchase this. If you are looking for something similar, i would recommend ColourPop 11:11 (cool to neutral). It gave me the look i was hoping for from Charlotte Tilbury, but for a fraction of the cost and more varied looks. For a high end option, try Natasha Denona glam face palette in the lightest shade. I won't say that either is a dupe for CT, but i liked both a lot better.

faceoff_positive.comments: This eyeshadow palette is beautiful and highly pigmented. I have fair skin and I apply the Walk Of No Shame Prime, Enhance and Pop eyeshadow colors on my eyelids, and I use the darkest crimson shade only to the outer corner of my eyes and very light on the upper and lower lashline. I highly recommend and love the eyeliner, lipstick and blush to complement your eye look!

It gave me the look i was hoping for from Charlotte Tilbury, but for a fraction of the cost and more varied looks. For a high end option, try Natasha Denona glam face palette in the lightest shade. I won't say that either is a dupe for CT, but i liked both a lot better.
